lyric:
[00:00.10]You used to call me on my cell phone
[00:04.92]Late night when you need my love
[00:09.07]Call me on my cell phone
[00:13.24]Late night when you need my love
[00:17.58]And I know when that hotline bling
[00:21.41]That can only mean one thing
[00:25.87]I know when that hotline bling
[00:30.18]That can only mean one thing
[00:33.52]'Cause ever since I left the city, you
[00:37.84]Got a reputation for yourself now
[00:42.15]Everybody knows and I feel left out
[00:46.32]Girl, you got me down, you got me stressed out
[00:50.43]‘Cause ever since I left the city, you
[00:54.68]Started wearing less and goin' out more
[00:58.96]Glasses of champagne out on the dance floor
[01:03.33]Hangin' with some girls I never seen before
[01:07.47]'Cause ever since I left the city
[01:36.47](Late night when you need my love)
[01:41.08](Call me on my cell phone)
[01:49.56](I know when that hotline bling)
[01:53.37](That can only mean one thing)
[01:57.87](I know when that hotline bling)
[02:02.20](That can only mean one thing)
tlyric:
[by:Trap_Girl]
[00:00.10]你以前总是打电话给我
[00:04.92]在你半夜需要我的爱的时候
[00:09.07]以前总是打电话给我
[00:13.24]在你半夜需要我的爱的时候
[00:17.58]我知道每当电话铃声响起
[00:21.41]那只意味着一件事情
[00:25.87]我知道每当电话铃声响起
[00:30.18]那只意味着一件事情
[00:33.52]因为自从我搬离了这座城市
[00:37.84]你也渐渐小有名气
[00:42.15]所有人都觉得我被你遗忘了
[00:46.32]女孩 这让我倍感失望 你让我焦虑不安
[00:50.43]因为自从我搬离了这座城市
[00:54.68]你穿得愈来愈暴露 经常混迹高端场合
[00:58.96]小口品着香槟 在舞池外徘徊
[01:03.33]身边尽是我从未见过的女孩
[01:07.47]因为自从我搬离了这座城市
[01:36.47]（在你半夜需要我的爱的时候）
[01:41.08]（以前总是打电话给我）
[01:49.56]（我知道每当电话铃声响起）
[01:53.37]（那只意味着一件事情）
[01:57.87]（我知道每当电话铃声响起）
[02:02.20]（那只意味着一件事情）
